Reviews.Title: BEWARE
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I took several pictures on a trip through Utah--about 8 or so of unusual rock formations--then when I tried to use the camera again, I got "card error"--contacted Samsung, and had to buy a new memory card--but lost all my pictures.  Very frustrating.  Don't know if I trust the camera yet.cjh

Reviews.Title: awsome product
Reviews.Author: sonja
Reviews.Content: i love it.. samsung is a very good brand and it shows in this product as well. they are just proving why you should buy a samsung. everything is as is said it was and it all works great.. i love how you can email pic right from the camera and post to fb right from the camera no taking anything out and putting it in a comp to do it.. samsung is great i live by them..
